description: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Python (Flask) and MongoDB, supporting key backend features and CRUD operations. Implemented robust input validation, error handling, and unit testing to ensure reliability and maintainability. Deployed and monitored backend services using AWS, collaborating with frontend teams for seamless integration.
points: Developed and maintained scalable RESTful APIs using Python (Flask) and MongoDB, enabling efficient CRUD operations and seamless front-end integration.
Designed Flask routes, services, and models aligned with REST standards and internal best practices.
Implemented robust data validation, error handling, and response management to ensure API reliability and user safety.
Optimized MongoDB queries to improve API response time and back-end performance.
Wrote unit tests to validate API functionality and ensure high code quality and coverage.
Integrated APIs with front-end components, collaborating closely with UI teams for end-to-end feature delivery.
Managed and monitored REST API deployments on AWS, contributing to deployment pipelines and cloud infrastructure.
Conducted API testing and participated in debugging and troubleshooting backend issues.
Suggested and implemented improvements to enhance code maintainability and performance.
Gained hands-on experience with Agile development practices, version control (Git), and cloud-based development tools.
